snippet: An investigation of conditions in the nation’s gulags has been aided by information from people have escaped the police state over the years.
abstract: United Nations Human Rights Council says investigation of human rights conditions in North Korea has uncovered horrifying abuses that demand international response.
lead_paragraph: An investigation of conditions in the nation’s gulags has been aided by information from people have escaped the police state over the years.

headline.main: U.N. Panel Urges International Action on North Korean Human Rights Abuses
